hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\purpleD4$ tens and $\purpleD5$ ones so, our first addend is $\purpleD{45}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/79d46c7e6f361a59964ac67951ed769f4888b981)

Our second set of blocks shows $\maroonD1$ ten and $\maroonD3$ ones so, our second addend is $\maroonD{13}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/1d35128139fb7d8c5c4db0a6f7b592e98257be0e)

Our sum shows $5$ tens and $8$ ones, or $58$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/bbf41824f9a43cc76b61c0b4d2e60337db2a4de3)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$\purpleD{45} + \maroonD{13} =58$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/5cefabb1c2f9b21ccd4f22e132cd7a2478fdbcb1)

[[☃ radio 1]]
